      static com.google.gson.JsonArray makeImageJSON​(java.util.ArrayList<SinglePageElement> Images)
      this function will create a JSON array with all of the images takes in a list of images, returns a JSON object containing the images

      this function will create a JSON array of pages takes in a list of pages, returns a JSON object containing the pages
      static com.google.gson.JsonArray makeJSONURL​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> inputURLS)
      this function will create a JSON array with all of the website URLs tajes in a list of URLs, returns a JSOn object containing the URLs
      static com.google.gson.JsonArray makeOtherJSON​(java.util.ArrayList<SinglePageElement> Elements)
      this function will generate the various JSON arrays for the generic file types such as archive, video, audio, and other (uncategorized) takes in a list of elements, returns a JSON object with those elements
      static java.lang.String outputJsonFile​(ListOfPages PageSet, ListOfPageElements ImageSet, ListOfPageElements ArchiveSet, ListOfPageElements VideoSet, ListOfPageElements AudioSet, ListOfPageElements UncategorizedSet)
      this function will handle creating the output of a JSON file first creates some basic objects, then calls other functions to populate them once everything is populated, the objects get dumped into the output file takes in the various page list and element lists, sends the data to helpers, returns the output JSON file name, which is later printed and saved
